channel.title: Need help adding a minigame
channel.description: willing to give rep and some money if someone could help me code this. I'm good with java. but this is a big step for me and i don't want to do it alone. I'd like to add a couple interfaces aswell to make it look a little better. please pm me http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,522512.msg3799828.html#msg3799828

item.title: Need help adding a minigame
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

This is just… sad. You’ve been here for a little over half a year brandon. So there is nothing “senior” about you. If your going to be a dick to those who actually try to help you, then you should just not expect help. I was originally going to help you, but screw it. I will give you one word of advice, interfaces - just copy others and go from there. That is the only help your going to get, and your lucky you get it. I hope one day you will look back and realise how much of an idiot you are being. Have a good day.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding a minigame
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:5, topic:437164”]Skiire: “member”
Brandontan: “senior member”
Get the f off of my post.
i know the rules. i’ve clearly been here WAAAAAYYY longer than you.
you trying to act like i’m “inferior” doesn’t work for me. OR mopar. a mod would ban your stingy a** before me. and i havent given anyone ANY money at all. so i haven’t broken one rule. so calm your tits and gtfo like i said the first time[/quote]

Being honest, from what I’ve seen I’d ban you before I’d even consider Skiire. Let me also remind you that titles such as ‘Senior member’ don’t mean anything but the amount of posts you have. I could make an account and achieve 500 posts within a month. It is the quality of the posts that count, not the quantity.

Your post also breaks rule 7 of this section, as suggested above. May I emphasize the wording in this rule:

Section Rules [READ OR GET PUNISHED] Last Updated: 7/23/11

[size=11pt]7.[/size] Offering a reward for someones help is not allowed, help is free on this community.

edit: You seem to be on a role today, you cannot have more than one account on this forum. I’ll let you decide which one you’d like to keep and the other 2 shall be banned.

Read full topic

So, I’m assuming you don’t want me to help you? I’ve asked now twice.

item.title: Need help adding a minigame
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:3, topic:437164”]us? wtf are you talking about who is “us” you are one person. I’m needing some help with a minigame so where do i post it??? “SERVER HELP” if you don’t “HELP” then gtfo
I would “DONATE” i wouldn’t pay. only because they helped me out. please don’t post if you aren’t helping.
ty[/quote]

Us is referring to those in the Server Help section who will be helping you. You don’t get one designated good-soul to help you, sorry about that bud.

7. Offering a reward for someones help is not allowed, help is free on this community.

Donation or not, that’s still against the sectional rules. I’m sorry I tried to prevent you from receiving disciplinary action from a Moderator, I’ll think twice before I try to give you some friendly advice.

Again, you didn’t tell us what you need help with. You just state you need help. Which implies to us, the Server Helpees, that you want us to do it for you.

I said I would help if you posted a specific question, which you refused to do because you thought flaming me would be a more useful approach to receiving help.

You’re welcome.

EDIT: I’m going to add this in here, because you failed to comprehend it the previous time I included it:

WHAT DO YOU NEED HELP WITH SPECIFICALLY?

Read full topic
